# ContactAccessButton.Caption

**Enumeration**

A list of access options to display in the contact access button when matching a contact’s name.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Caption
```

## Overview

Set the caption of a contact access button with the view modifier [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/contactAccessButtonCaption(_:)]. When the query produces a single result, the content access button shows the the caption under the matching contact name. For example, a search for `Anne` could show a button that displays the matching name “Anne Johnson” with a caption line of “annejohnson1@icloud.com” when the caption type is [doc://com.apple.Contacts-UI/documentation/ContactsUI/ContactAccessButton/Caption/email].

## Caption options

- **ContactAccessButton.Caption.defaultText**: A caption option that displays a default value.
- **ContactAccessButton.Caption.email**: A caption option that displays an email address for the contact.
- **ContactAccessButton.Caption.phone**: A caption option that displays a phone number for the contact.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
